```{r}
# import libraries
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
h <- function(t, a, b, d, e) exp(-a * t) * sin(t * b + 3) + exp(-d * t) * sin(t * e + 1)
f <- sample(2:3, 4, TRUE)
d <- runif(4, 0, 0.01)

seq(1, 80, 0.0005) %>%
  data.frame(., x=h(., d[1], f[1], d[2], f[2]), y=h(., d[3], f[3], d[4], f[4])) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x, y)) +
    geom_path() +
    theme_void()
```
